snippet: What’s really behind the decision to exempt passengers older than 75 from having to remove their shoes to pass through airport security.
abstract: Loose Ends column by author Calvin Trillin examines the Transportation Safety Administration's decision to exempt passengers older than 75 from having to remove their shoes to pass through airport security.
lead_paragraph: What’s really behind the decision to exempt passengers older than 75 from having to remove their shoes to pass through airport security.
